fields.name: txtSSNChild1
fields.title: Child1's SSN: The child must have an SSN as defined in the instructions for Form 1040 or 1040-SR, line 27, unless the child was born and died in 2021. If your child was born and died in 2021 and did not have an SSN, enter Died on this line and attach a copy of the child's birth certificate, death certificate, or hospital medical records showing a live birth

fields.name: cboNoMonthsLivedChild1
fields.title: Line 6 Number of months child lived with you in the United States during 2021 If the child lived with you for more than half of 2021 but less than 7 months, enter 7. If the child was born or died in 2021 and your home was the child's home for more than half the time he or she was alive during 2021, enter 12
